opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Illinois Central Railroad Co. v. Smallwood

opinion:
544 U.S. 992

ILLINOIS CENTRAL RAILROAD CO. ET AL.
v.
SMALLWOOD.

No. 04-831.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 18, 2005.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Motions of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America et al., Association of American Railroads, American Security Insurance Company, and Bryan D. Collins et al. for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 385 F. 3d 568.
